Suddenly you wake up and soon u find a tool that open shortcuts on many surfaces and with the help of some cubes and other gestures, you solve puzzles and progress levels.

I liked most the demolished facilities that blend in with puzzle solving, it makes a nice atmosphere like a big corporation had enormous power and unrestrained technological vision but not anymore.. so you play around with their stuff.. 

The 'characters' you meet aren't the evil sort, just disappointed and that leads to irony shelter and dark humor dialogues; all in the name of good old science!

This is an Absolutely amazing game! I cannot even begin to describe how well put together this game is. Its a fun logic game that really tests your brain in a fun way (with some added humour sprinkled in) It took me about a week and a half to finish (not playing continuously) but is was a really enjoyable game to just chill out and play.
10/10 recommend this game to anyone

Portal 2 is one of my favorite games of the last decade. period.
Great writing, awesome characters, new ways to solve puzzles in each chamber.
and the Co-op, editor map and the active community it's just icing on the cake (It's not a lie let me tell ya).

I Highly recommend to play it and get it at full price. do it. for Financial Science!
